availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jefferson Perry Crafford (Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Margret Cummins Crafford in Harrison County, Kentucky, on April 20, 1851. Father of James K. Crafford and Jefferson Perry Crafford, Jr. Farmer for George W. Garnett in Harrison County in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 1, p. 103B-104A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, p. 619.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Illinois, Jasper County, Crooked Creek, p. 267A.
"Jefferson Perry Crafford (1833-1904)," Find A Grave, Memorial #32595850, accessed October 27, 2021, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/32595850.
Kentucky Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Harrison County Marriages, 1831-1867, Film #000216896, p. 15.
